abstract: Mother of Amir Hekmati, American of Iranian descent imprisoned in Tehran for nearly three years, has written to Pres Obama asking him to keep her son in mind in negotiations with Iran over its disputed nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: The letter from Behnaz Hekmati, the mother of Amir Hekmati, appeared timed to convey the family’s wish that the United States use its leverage in the talks to win his release.

headline.main: A Mother Asks Obama: ‘Please Remember My Amir’
